AppHeader.notificationUpdateMessage: A new version of the dashboard software is ready to be installed.
AppHeader.notificationNewUserMessage: John Doe has just signed up. Welcome them!
AppHeader.notificationAlertMessage: Unusual login activity detected on your account.

GeneralSettingsForm.settingsSavedToastDescription: Your general settings have been updated and stored locally.

GeneralSettingsPage.title: General Settings
GeneralSettingsPage.description: Manage general application settings, such as site name, default language, and timezone.

AppearanceSettingsPage.title: Appearance Settings
AppearanceSettingsPage.description: Customize the look and feel of your application, including theme, colors, and layout options.
AppearanceSettingsPage.themeDescription: Select the color scheme for the application.

UserManagementPage.title: User Management
UserManagementPage.description: Manage all users in the system. You can add, edit, and delete user accounts.

SettingsPage.title: Application Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage various settings for your application.

UploadItemsPage.title: Upload New Item
UploadItemsPage.description: Provide item details and select a file to upload. Max file size: 5MB.

ManageDataPage.title: Manage Data
ManageDataPage.description: View, create, edit, and delete data items in your system.

DashboardPage.welcomeBannerMessage: Here's a summary of recent activity. You have 3 new tasks requiring your attention.
DashboardPage.recentActivitiesDescription: What's been happening in the system.

ProfilePage.title: User Profile
ProfilePage.description: View and manage your profile details.

ProfileEditForm.dialogDescription: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.
ProfileEditForm.updateErrorMessage: Could not update profile. Please try again.
